subject: Leukemia
Hockey, Ice
Medicine and Health
lead_paragraph: Yale’s Mandi Schwartz had attributed her fatigue to the rigors of college hockey. But when she went to the doctor in December 2008, the diagnosis was far worse: acute myeloid leukemia.
snippet: Yale’s Mandi Schwartz had attributed her fatigue to the rigors of college hockey. But when she went to the doctor in December 2008, the diagnosis was far worse: acute myeloid leukemia.
